title: Padded
contents: text | Padded armor consists of quilted layers of cloth and batting.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Leather
contents: text | The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Studded leather
contents: text | Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Hide
contents: text | This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Chain shirt
contents: text | Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Scale mail
contents: text | This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Breastplate
contents: text | This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Half plate
contents: text | Half plate consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It does not include leg protection beyond simple greaves that are attached with leather straps.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Ring mail
contents: text | This armor is leather armor with heavy rings sewn into it. The rings help reinforce the armor against blows from swords and axes. Ring mail is inferior to chain mail, and it's usually worn only by those who can't afford better armor.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Chain mail
contents: text | Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Splint
contents: text | This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible chain mail protects the joints.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Plate
contents: text | Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Shield
contents: text | A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

title: Club
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Dagger
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Greatclub
contents: property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Handaxe
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Javelin
contents: property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (30 / 120) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Light hammer
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.

title: Quarterstaff
contents: property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

title: Sickle
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Spear
contents: property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Crossbow, light
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Loading | You can fire only one piece of ammunition from it regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.
property | Range (80 / 320) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Dart
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Shortbow
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.
property | Range (80 / 320) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Sling
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Range (30 / 120) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Battleaxe
contents: property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

title: Glaive
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Reach | This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it, as well as when determining your reach for opportunity attacks with it.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Greataxe
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Greatsword
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Halberd
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Reach | This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it, as well as when determining your reach for opportunity attacks with it.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Lance
contents: property | Reach | This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it, as well as when determining your reach for opportunity attacks with it.
property | Special | A weapon with the special property has unusual rules governing its use, explained in the weapon's description (see “Special Weapons” later in this section).

title: Longsword
contents: property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

title: Maul
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Pike
contents: property | Heavy Weapon | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
property | Reach | This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it, as well as when determining your reach for opportunity attacks with it.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Rapier
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.

title: Scimitar
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Shortsword
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Trident
contents: property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Warhammer
contents: property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

title: Whip
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Reach | This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it, as well as when determining your reach for opportunity attacks with it.

title: Blowgun
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Loading | You can fire only one piece of ammunition from it regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
property | Range (25 / 100) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Crossbow, hand
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Loading | You can fire only one piece of ammunition from it regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Range (30 / 120) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Crossbow, heavy
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Loading | You can fire only one piece of ammunition from it regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.
property | Range (100 / 400) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Longbow
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.
property | Range (150 / 600) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Net
contents: property | Special | A weapon with the special property has unusual rules governing its use, explained in the weapon's description (see “Special Weapons” later in this section).
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (5 / 15 ) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Alchemist's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Brewer's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Calligrapher's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Carpenter's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Cartographer's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Cobbler's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Cook's utensils
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Glassblower's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Jeweler's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Leatherworker's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Mason's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Painter's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Potter's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Smith's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Tinker's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Weaver's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Woodcarver's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Disguise kit
contents: text | This pouch of cosmetics, hair dye, and small props lets you create disguises that change your physical appearance. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a visual disguise.

title: Forgery kit
contents: text | This small box contains a variety of papers and parchments, pens and inks, seals and sealing wax, gold and silver leaf, and other supplies necessary to create convincing forgeries of physical documents. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a physical forgery of a document.

title: Herbalism kit
contents: text | This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to identify or apply herbs. Also, proficiency with this kit is required to create antitoxin and potions of healing.

title: Navigator's tools
contents: text | This set of instruments is used for navigation at sea. Proficiency with navigator's tools lets you chart a ship's course and follow navigation charts. In addition, these tools allow you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability check you make to avoid getting lost at sea.

title: Poisoner's kit
contents: text | A poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or use poisons.

title: Thieves' tools
contents: text | This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

title: Dice set
contents: text | If you are proficient with a gaming set, you can add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play a game with that set. Each type of gaming set requires a separate proficiency.

title: Playing card set
contents: text | If you are proficient with a gaming set, you can add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play a game with that set. Each type of gaming set requires a separate proficiency.

title: Abacus
contents: text | A standard tool used to make calculations.

title: Acid (Vial)
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the acid as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 acid damage.

title: Alchemists Fire (Flask)
contents: text | This sticky, adhesive fluid ignites when exposed to air. As an action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the alchemist's fire as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

title: Antitoxin (Vial)
contents: text | A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour. It confers no benefit to undead or constructs.

title: Backpack
contents: text | A backpack is a leather pack carried on the back, typically with straps to secure it. A backpack can hold 1 cubic foot/ 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

title: Ball Bearings (Bag of 1000)
contents: text | As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level, square area that is 10 feet on a side. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

title: Barrel
contents: text | A barrel can hold 40 gallons of liquid, or 4 cubic feet of solid material.

title: Basket
contents: text | A basket can hold 2 cubic feet / 40 pounds of gear.

title: Bedroll
contents: text | You never know where you're going to sleep, and a bedroll helps you get better sleep in a hayloft or on the cold ground. A bedroll consists of bedding and a blanket thin enough to be rolled up and tied. In an emergency, it can double as a stretcher.

title: Bell
contents: text | A standard bell that rings, typically used for signaling.

title: Blanket
contents: text | A thick, quilted, blanket made to keep you warm in cold weather.

title: Block and Tackle
contents: text | A set of pulleys with a cable threaded through them and a hook to attach to objects, a block and tackle allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

title: Book
contents: text | A book might contain poetry, historical accounts, information pertaining to a particular field of lore, diagrams and notes on gnomish contraptions, or just about anything else that can be represented using text or pictures. A book of spells is a spellbook (see 'Spellbook' item).

title: Bottle, Glass
contents: text | A bottle can hold 1 1/2 pints of liquid.

title: Bucket
contents: text | A bucket can hold 3 gallons of liquid, or 1/2 cubic foot of solid material.

title: Caltrops (Bag of 20)
contents: text | As an action, you can spread a bag of caltrops to cover a square area that is 5 feet on a side. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving this turn and take 1 piercing damage. Taking this damage reduces the creature's walking speed by 10 feet until the creature regains at least 1 hit point. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

title: Candle
contents: text | For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

title: Case, Crossbow Bolt
contents: text | This wooden case can hold up to twenty crossbow bolts.

title: Case, Map or Scroll
contents: text | This cylindrical leather case can hold up to ten rolled-up sheets of paper or five rolled-up sheets of parchment.

title: Chain (10 feet)
contents: text | A chain has 10 hit points. It can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

title: Chalk (1 Piece)
contents: text | A piece of chalk used for writing and marking on various surfaces.

title: Chest
contents: text | A chest can hold 12 cubic feet / 300 pounds of gear.

title: Climber's Kit
contents: text | A climber's kit includes special pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. You can use the climber's kit as an action to anchor yourself; when you do, you can't fall more than 25 feet from the point where you anchored yourself, and you can't climb more than 25 feet away from that point without undoing the anchor.

title: Clothes, Common
contents: text | This set of clothes could consist of a loose shirt and baggy breeches, or a loose shirt and skirt or overdress. Cloth wrappings are used for shoes.

title: Clothes, Costume
contents: text | This set of clothes is fashioned after a particular costume, typically meant for entertaining.

title: Clothes, Fine
contents: text | This set of clothes is designed specifically to be expensive and to show it, including fancy, tailored clothes in whatever fashion happens to be the current style in the courts of the nobles. Precious metals and gems could be worked into the clothing.

title: Clothes, Travelers
contents: text | This set of clothes could consist of boots, a wool skirt or breeches, a sturdy belt, a shirt (perhaps with a vest or jacket), and an ample cloak with a hood.

title: Crowbar
contents: text | Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

title: Fishing Tackle
contents: text | This kit includes a wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, velvet lures, and narrow netting.

title: Flask or Tankard
contents: text | A flask or tankard can hold 1 pint of liquid.

title: Grappling Hook
contents: text | When tied to the end of a rope, a grappling hook can secure the rope to a battlement, window ledge, tree limb, or other protrusion.

title: Hammer
contents: text | This one-handed hammer with an iron head is useful for pounding pitons into a wall.

title: Hammer, Sledge
contents: text | This two-handed, iron-headed hammer is good for smashing open treasure chests.

title: Healer's Kit
contents: text | This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has ten uses. As an action, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

title: Holy Water (Vial)
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a target creature, treating the holy water as an improvised weapon. If the target is a fiend or undead, it takes 2d6 radiant damage. A cleric or paladin may create holy water by performing a special ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour to perform, uses 25 gp worth of powdered silver, and requires the caster to expend a 1st-level spell slot.

title: Hourglass
contents: text | A standard hourglass used to measure the passage of time.

title: Hunting Trap
contents: text | When you use your action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 piercing damage and stop moving. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet long). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

title: Ink (1 ounce bottle)
contents: text | Ink is typically used with an ink pen to write.

title: Ink Pen
contents: text | An ink pen is a wooden stick with a special tip on the end. The tip draws ink in when dipped in a vial and leaves an ink trail when drawn across a surface.

title: Jug or Pitcher
contents: text | A jug or pitcher can hold 1 gallon of liquid.

title: Ladder (10 foot)
contents: text | This item is a straight, simple wooden ladder.

title: Lamp
contents: text | A lamp casts bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

title: Lantern, Bullseye
contents: text | A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

title: Lantern, Hooded
contents: text | A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

title: Lock
contents: text | A key is provided with the lock. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick this lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Your DM may decide that better locks are available for higher prices.

title: Magnifying Glass
contents: text | This lens allows a closer look at small objects. It is also useful as a substitute for flint and steel when starting fires. Lighting a fire with a magnifying glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite. A magnifying glass grants advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect an item that is small or highly detailed.

title: Manacles
contents: text | These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. Escaping the manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check. Breaking them requires a successful DC 20 Strength check. Each set of manacles comes with one key. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick the manacles' lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Manacles have 15 hit points.

title: Mess Kit
contents: text | This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

title: Mirror, Steel
contents: text | A steel mirror is handy when you want to look around corners, signal friends with reflected sunlight, keep an eye on a medusa, make sure that you look good enough to present yourself to the queen, or examine wounds that you've received on hard-to-see parts of your body.

title: Oil (Flask)
contents: text | Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, treating the oil as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

title: Paper (50 sheets)
contents: text | A sheet of standard paper is made from cloth fibers.

title: Parchment (50 sheets)
contents: text | A sheet of parchment is a piece of goat hide or sheepskin that has been prepared for writing on.

title: Perfume (Vial)
contents: text | A fragrant commodity typically used by the wealthy.

title: Pick, Miner's
contents: text | A miner's pick is designed to concentrate the force of its blow on a small area.

title: Piton
contents: text | When a wall doesn't offer handholds and footholds, you can make your own. A piton is a steel spike with an eye through which you can loop a rope.

title: Poison, Basic (Vial)
contents: text | You can use the poison in this vial to coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. Applying the poison takes an action. A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying.

title: Pole (10-foot)
contents: text | When you suspect a trap, you can put the end of your 10-foot pole through that hole in the wall instead of reaching in with your hand.

title: Pot, Iron
contents: text | An iron pot can hold 1 gallon of liquid.

title: Pouch
contents: text | A cloth or leather pouch can hold 1/5 cubic foot / 6 pounds of gear - or up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch.

title: Quiver
contents: text | A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

title: Ram, Portable
contents: text | You can use a portable ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus on the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you advantage on this check.

title: Rations (1 day)
contents: text | Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

title: Rope, Hempen (50 Feet)
contents: text | Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 Hit Points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

title: Rope, Silken (50 Feet)
contents: text | Rope, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

title: Sack
contents: text | A sack can hold 1 cubic foot / 30 pounds of gear.

title: Scale, Merchant's
contents: text | A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small Objects, such as raw precious metals or Trade Goods, to help determine their worth.

title: Sealing Wax
contents: text | When you press a signet ring into warm sealing wax, you leave an identifying mark.

title: Shovel
contents: text | A standard shovel used for digging.

title: Signal Whistle
contents: text | A small whistle used for signaling.

title: Spellbook
contents: text | Essential for wizards, a Spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording Spells.

title: Spikes, iron (10)
contents: text | Standard iron spikes typically used with a hammer.

title: Spyglass
contents: text | Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

title: Tent, Two-Person
contents: text | A simple and portable canvas shelter, a tent sleeps two.

title: Tinderbox
contents: text | This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

title: Torch
contents: text | A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee Attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

title: Vial
contents: text | A vial can hold up to 4 ounces of liquid.

title: Waterskin
contents: text | A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

title: Whetstone
contents: text | A standard whetstone used to sharpen blades.
